local_intent: Perceive the green bin lid, move above it, then retry approach-and-align to the lid edge and verify pose lock.
assumptions: Lid can be detected after scanning
Overhead path is collision-free under the table edge
Gripper is empty and stationary during approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive→detect→move-above→approach/align segment of the global plan with retry for misalignment and final pose verification before subsequent grasp steps.
